subject: Order #SSN5726 #10460
description_text: Hello,  I placed an order on January 4th through your website and completed full payment, but I have not received any tracking number and no response to my previous emails.  At this point, the order appears not to have been shipped.  Please provide a valid tracking number within 48 hours of this email.  If I do not receive a response or tracking number within this timeframe, I will proceed with a PayPal/card chargeback for non-delivery of goods.  I hope this can be resolved immediately.  Regards, Nikos Xalkias

conversations.body_text: Hi nikos xalkias,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Do you ever expect me to have the product?
Hi nikos xalkias,    For Greece, we can only ship from our German warehouse. We will ship your order as soon as possible.
nice, I'm waiting for the shipping number and cashback or discount code for my next purchase

Hi nikos xalkias,    We apologize that the goods from the German warehouse are not expected to arrive until the 22nd. If you require them urgently, we can switch your order to a 2-pedal set shipped directly from the German warehouse as soon as possible and refund the price difference.
